sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtcadministcoderecptnlog ( OCCRRNC_DE /* */ , ADMINIST_ZONE_SE /* */ , ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE /* */ , OPERT_SN /* */ , CHANGE_SE_CODE /* */ , PROCESS_SE /* */ , ADMINIST_ZONE_NM /* */ , LOWEST_ADMINIST_ZONE_NM /* */ , CTPRVN_CODE /* */ , SIGNGU_CODE /* */ , EMD_CODE /* */ , LI_CODE /* */ , CREAT_DE /* */ , ABL_DE /* */ , ABL_ENNC /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #occrrncDe# /* */ , #administZoneSe# /* */ , #administZoneCode# /* */ , #opertSn# /* */ , #changeSeCode# /* */ , #processSe# /* */ , #administZoneNm# /* */ , #lowestAdministZoneNm# /* */ , #ctprvnCode# /* */ , #signguCode# /* */ , #emdCode# /* */ , #liCode# /* */ , #creatDe# /* */ , #ablDe# /* */ , #ablEnnc# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtcadministcoderecptnlog SET OCCRRNC_DE=#occrrncDe# /* */ , ADMINIST_ZONE_SE=#administZoneSe# /* */ , ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE=#administZoneCode# /* */ , OPERT_SN=#opertSn# /* */ , CHANGE_SE_CODE=#changeSeCode# /* */ , PROCESS_SE=#processSe# /* */ , ADMINIST_ZONE_NM=#administZoneNm# /* */ , LOWEST_ADMINIST_ZONE_NM=#lowestAdministZoneNm# /* */ , CTPRVN_CODE=#ctprvnCode# /* */ , SIGNGU_CODE=#signguCode# /* */ , EMD_CODE=#emdCode# /* */ , LI_CODE=#liCode# /* */ , CREAT_DE=#creatDe# /* */ , ABL_DE=#ablDe# /* */ , ABL_ENNC=#ablEnnc# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE OCCRRNC_DE=#occrrncDe# /* */ AND ADMINIST_ZONE_SE=#administZoneSe# /* */ AND ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE=#administZoneCode# /* */ AND OPERT_SN=#opertSn# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtcadministcoderecptnlog WHERE OCCRRNC_DE=#occrrncDe# /* */ AND ADMINIST_ZONE_SE=#administZoneSe# /* */ AND ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE=#administZoneCode# /* */ AND OPERT_SN=#opertSn# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT OCCRRNC_DE /* */ , ADMINIST_ZONE_SE /* */ , ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE /* */ , OPERT_SN /* */ , CHANGE_SE_CODE /* */ , PROCESS_SE /* */ , ADMINIST_ZONE_NM /* */ , LOWEST_ADMINIST_ZONE_NM /* */ , CTPRVN_CODE /* */ , SIGNGU_CODE /* */ , EMD_CODE /* */ , LI_CODE /* */ , CREAT_DE /* */ , ABL_DE /* */ , ABL_ENNC /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtcadministcoderecptnlog WHERE OCCRRNC_DE=#occrrncDe# /* */ AND ADMINIST_ZONE_SE=#administZoneSe# /* */ AND ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE=#administZoneCode# /* */ AND OPERT_SN=#opertSn# /* */

SELECT OCCRRNC_DE /* */ , ADMINIST_ZONE_SE /* */ , ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE /* */ , OPERT_SN /* */ , CHANGE_SE_CODE /* */ , PROCESS_SE /* */ , ADMINIST_ZONE_NM /* */ , LOWEST_ADMINIST_ZONE_NM /* */ , CTPRVN_CODE /* */ , SIGNGU_CODE /* */ , EMD_CODE /* */ , LI_CODE /* */ , CREAT_DE /* */ , ABL_DE /* */ , ABL_ENNC /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtcadministcoderecptnlog WHERE 1=1
OCCRRNC_DE = #searchKeyword# /* */
ADMINIST_ZONE_SE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY OCCRRNC_DE DESC /* */ , ADMINIST_ZONE_SE DESC /* */ , ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE DESC /* */ , OPERT_SN DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#
